adrFormatAddress: 40 Ludlow St, New York, NY 10002, USA

originalText.text: I scored it at 10. I trained for a few years way back and was blessed to compete. Now, coming back in my 30s, starting at square one, you gotta be humble and you look for a place with positive reenforcement, good vibes, and people who can push you. Went for that first class, instructor was attentive, aggressive, well learned and cool. Everyone SUPER friendly. Superb conditioning. Notably, its not fancy, its real, its a great price and the beginner class is cool for all levels. Buying a package now. Highly recommend

originalText.text: Love to learn more about the culture especially cause I am Thai myself and I want to learn how to defend myself after being bullied for 7 years since elementary. Great place and wonderful staffs would definitely recommend to come here.

originalText.text:
Absolutely amazing coaches and welcoming presence
Students so very helpful and supportive
Clean and cool presentation
So very blessed to have the honor of meeting Superbon and Petchanong (One championship fighters) !

Absolutely amazing coaches and welcoming presence
Students so very helpful and supportive
Clean and cool presentation
So very blessed to have the honor of meeting Superbon and Petchanong (One championship fighters) !

originalText.text: Gathering up the courage to train at TBMT has been one of the best decisions I've made in a while. I was incredibly intimidated at first but on my very first day, Zack the coach approached me and reassured me that beginners are always welcome and it's only been up from there. Every session I attend I've learned so much and everyone has been incredibly supportive and welcoming. Prices are incredibly affordable and not only are you buying priceless training, but you're also buying into a tight knit community that pushes themselves for the better! I immediately bought another 5-class pass after I used my first five sessions and I'm definitely considering PT from some of the coaches. They put you to work and challenge you and I leave every class I've been to so far better and more disciplined than when I walked in. Can't wait to train here long term!

Prices are incredibly affordable and not only are you buying priceless training, but you're also buying into a tight knit community that pushes themselves for the better! They put you to work and challenge you and I leave every class I've been to so far better and more disciplined than when I walked in. Can't wait to train here long term!

originalText.text:
TBMT has become a second home! The coaches are skilled, knowledgeable, and patient with all members. Whether it’s your first class or you’ve been training for years, you will find space to work on your technique. It’s both a great workout and a great community. Truly all experience levels are welcome, and the environment is open, friendly, and focused.

This gym has done an exceptional job empowering women and other people who do not typically see themselves represented in a combat sport. Because of this place, I have found strength, empowerment, and close friends.

I cannot recommend enough!
